p: Thus, the scientific community has focused its efforts on the search for selective COX-2 inhibitors, with lower adverse side effects, since highly selective COX-2 inhibitors are required for the treatment of inflammatory diseases [ 35]. The first selective COX-2 inhibitor was celecoxib (Celebrex ®), followed by rofecoxib (Vioxx ®). In a short time, the coxibs (celecoxib and rofecoxib) have achieved wide dissemination [ 36]. Other drugs are also more selective for COX-2 than for COX-1, such as nimesulide and etodolac [ 37].
